import React from 'react' import { ModalHeader, ModalBody, Row } from 'reactstrap' import { Calendar, dateFnsLocalizer } from 'react-big-calendar' import format from 'date-fns/format' import parse from 'date-fns/parse' import startOfWeek from 'date-fns/startOfWeek' import getDay from 'date-fns/getDay' import 'react-big-calendar/lib/css/react-big-calendar.css' import '../styles/Schedule.css' const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) const locales = { "en-US": require('date-fns/locale/en-US') } const localizer = dateFnsLocalizer({ format, parse, startOfWeek, getDay, locales }) const events = [ { title: "Big Meeting", allDay: true, start: new Date(2023, 4, 0), end: new Date(2023, 4, 0) }, { title: "Vacation", start: new Date(2023, 4, 0), end: new Date(2023, 4, 0) }, { title: "Conference", start: new Date(2023, 4, 0), end: new Date(2023, 4, 0) }, ] function Schedule() { return (

Calendar

size='lg' isOpen={modal} toggle={() => setModal(!modal)} toggle={() => setModal(!modal)} Popup
) } export default Schedule
